title: Paris (My Globetrotter Book): Global adventures...in the palm of your hands!
description: Kids - Take a trip around the globe, and discover the fun and exciting adventures that await you!Finish drawing the Eiffel Tower. What did the Romans leave behind in Paris? Can you find your way out of the Montmartre maze? Help Louis XIV put his day back in order. And so much more.28 pages of games, educational puzzles and fun, for children 6 to 12 years. Brightly illustrated pages brimming with activities to explore culture and customs, some history, sites of interest, food, language, and much more. As a bonus, crack a secret code to print the seal and stick it on to your very own Globetrotter Certificate!Other cities available too: New York, Bangkok, Tokyo, Quebec & Montreal
author: Marisha Wojciechowska
